#include "point.h"
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <math.h>

struct Point {
 double x, y;
}

struct Point* makepoint(double x, double y) {
 struct Point* p = malloc(sizeof(struct Point));

 p->x = x;
 p->y = y;

 return p;
}

double distance(struct Point* p1, struct Point* p2) {
 double dx = p1->x - p2->x;
 double dy = p1->y - p2->y;

 return sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
